blueprint.description: Installs LSD (LSDeluxe, a better alternative to the ls command) on nearly any playform
blueprint.overview: [LSD](https://github.com/Peltoche/lsd) (LSDeluxe), a clone of ls, is the next gen ls command with colorful output, file type icons, and more.
blueprint.name: LSD (LSDeluxe)
blueprint.title: LSD (LSDeluxe)
